_sText:
This Map was under Construction a few years back. As XPGaming servers dwindled. So did our teams  hope for this map. I am now releasing this map which fully works for public testing. When this map was being created, over a half of year of developing was put into it by 3 authors and a texture developer
Evilhomer
Instant Death
]ES[ Church Xx ]GaD[

Evilwaffle

this map has 64 player spawns several different levels for zombies and humans to roam around

A City, A Dungeon, An underground, a desert, the Arctic, and a lush jungle. 

Originally The map was over 47 MB with Custom content and content from portal. Most of this content was removed to limit filesize.

When the players choose a level, All other levels seal off and players who are trapped are teleported back to the spawn. The Mayhem begins.

Everyone please enjoy.
64 player spawns
Anyone feel free to download and change this map around but give credit to the original authors

Thank You

EDIT*** Custom Portal Props removed (2 were left in)

All Custom textures were remade by Evilwaffle using several pictures of portal
